website_summaries.verdict: This model looks great, is easy to move to different areas of the house, and is powerful enough to cool a home's larger rooms.
pros: 12,000 BTUs is the most powerful unit LG produces, and that power allows this model to cool rooms up to 300 square feet, which means this AC will handle even large living rooms
The caster wheels make the unit easily portable, and the graphite gray color is a nice alternative to the traditional white color of most portable AC units
The dehumidifier will remove up to 2.6 pints of moisture per hour
cons: The lack of an energy-saving setting may cause this unit to be more expensive to run than some units

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!  This item is NON-returnable!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon should be held liable for not clearly listing items that are unable to be returned. Mine arrived busted and they wont take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Zha93

customer_reviews.title: Worst piece of crap ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, it didn’t work from the first day of unboxing. I called Amazon support and they told me a return was impossible. I’ve never heard this before. I thought I’d give it a chance still before reselling it to someone else. Still does not cool a room down by any noticeable degree. My tower fan does a better job. This is simply a heater disguised as an AC. So if you want to prank someone you don’t like, give them this a s a ‘gift’ and they’ll understand. WARNING DO NOT BUY THIS AS IT IS NON RETURNABLE!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David J Zarza

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived damaged. Contacted Amazon to replace, told it was not returnable. Contacted LG got the runaround. Furious because it’s damaged my floor leaking water! Piece of garbage! Note in the photo, the broken wheel in the overflowed water tray I needed to place under the brand new leaking unit. LG should be ashamed!
customer_reviews.author: Bartola

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one and the 8,000 BTU Frigidaire to supplement my central AC - this one is more powerful (seems a tad colder and blows a little stronger); however, the Frigidaire is quieter and nicer looking. The exhaust assembly on the Frigidaire is easier to install and seals better with the unit than this one (which is literally a round tube in a square connector, apparently the engineers are not aware of this aphorism??). I used packing tape on both to seal up the exhaust tubes to body attachment. Dollar for dollar, an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Suburban New York

customer_reviews.title: Smart AC makes life easier.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it without having barely any reviews. Was skeptical but jumped in. It’s LG. All my appliances in my home are LG and are all great products. This is no different. I only wish that it’s air flow pointing mechanism would face more horizontal as my condo is a little elongated and I would like to push the airflow as far as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Leeder

customer_reviews.title: Cools effectively
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cool our master bedroom which is much hotter than the rest of the house. It does a great job of making the room nice and cool and much easier to sleep in. I'm used to having fans on while sleeping so the noise from the air conditioner is not bothersome. Would recommend to anybody looking to cool down a good-sized room.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Received a battered, broken AC but works;  so that's good I guess
customer_reviews.text: Received the AC with the bottom panel almost in pieces. One of the corner wheel bases is broken and has gotten pushed into the bottom panel, parts of the panel are split and hanging out with wires visible. The casing body is broken on the right side and generates a keening noise when the AC is running. The only silver lining is that the AC still runs, except that the remote doesn't. Just the fact that this thing runs and it is freakish heavy is why I haven't returned it yet. And this is the last time I am ordering anything this expensive and heavy from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: S Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Wow love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small bedroom that heats up like Hades and this has helped me to be able to sleep without waking up sweating. It is very easy to assemble the window pieces and put together a few exhaust pieces. A couple pieces showed up cracked and I called LG and all I had to do was to send them a picture of my proof of purchase and they mailed out the pieces immediately via FedEx. Wonderful customer service at LG. I spoke to Toni and he was great. I highly recommend this portable air conditioner for any room up to 300 sq feet
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: You must Vent this unit to the outside, like a window unit.
customer_reviews.text: This Product was to be for an all weather room. The only issue I have with the product is the venting system. It needs to be vented to the outside and I have floor to ceiling windows. The venting will be out onto my wood deck. This does not work for me. The Product is a great design besides that. It is Perfect for a Smaller Apartment that has no Air-conditioning and does not want to use a Window unit.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner is surprisingly good. I live in a small one-time bedroom house with a window AC in the main living area, but needed something for the bedroom. I tried strategically placed fans and air circulators, but that didn't work. My bedroom has west facing windows, so it heats up a lot in the afternoon/evening. I placed this unit in the room and now it's COLD at night, even with the 100+ heat. My only complaints are the short power cord and the large amount of floor space this unit takes up.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: ordered 2x and both times the unit was damanged in delivery
customer_reviews.text: The first order did not cool at all... called LG and they did come and look at the unit. The box was clearly damaged and teh repairperson comfimed the compressor was cracked from being dropped. I sent it back and asked for a replacement... the 2nd unit was extremely loud and once again, there were several broken off pieces in the box where the unit had been damaged during handling. I would not recommend buying this unit from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Pre-opened box. Super Noisy and falling apart
customer_reviews.text: This was obviously a unit that had been serviced before. Part of the panels have large gaps (where they should be seamless). When I say "noise" I don't mean the usual wooshing sound of air movement or the standard noise of compressors. There's an extremely loud rattling sound. Which is probably related to the fact this unit was damaged and "fixed" before they sold it as a "new" unit. I know this is not natural because I bought a similar unit from Home Depo and that unit is doing great. Everything works, no noise, no weird gaps, no boxes with holes in them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled it out of the box, it worked for 30 mins, no fan grinds, until it locks up. It will work if you want to hold it at a 30 degree angle all night, fan assembly must not have been installed correctly at the factory. I have had bad luck with LG in the past (washer). Whats the expression fool you once shame on you, fool me twice shame on me.
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW C SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Cooolllddd
customer_reviews.text: I seriously wish I would have bought this years ago. My husband and I live by the beach and none of the homes have A/C. This thing is a game changer. It is noisy, but no noisier than a regular sized floor fan, and it is worth it. No more sleepless summer nights!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and WIFI (phone) connected, but the in-window units will have more cooling power.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the premium price. I just like the portable, not permanent window installation because I can easily take the hose out of the window at night for better security.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander E. Kent

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows...well.
customer_reviews.text: The remote is directional so point it right at it, it blow VERY cool, in my bedroom (Oregon) keeps me nice and chill when I close the door. It is noisy, but for $250....seriously I am OK with it and expected it. It does it’s job well. Remote has a timer you can set which is nice. Doubt it is too energy efficient at $250. I have a Delonghi Pinguino 550 Sq Ft. from Costco in living room, this is easy twice as loud than that. But I sleep like the dead and it becomes white noise in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does the job, reliably.
customer_reviews.text: Cools a 400sq/ft room from 90 degrees to 78 in about 10 minutes, and down to 74 in 30 min. Reliable and smart looking, easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I did tape the insulation on it like ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I did tape the insulation on it like one reviewer said. Hose did not fall out from heat. All insulation is still taped on. Cools a very big open room by pulling out most of hot air. Perfect for us. This year 2020 we don’t have the insulation on it and it still works good. I taped it with duct tape and have a stool under the hose. Would work much better in a room with doors. We have it vented to outside.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable a/c
customer_reviews.text: I love this model of air conditioner. I bought one previously for my home this one is for my office. It cools a hot room quickly and maintains a nice temperature. The sound is medium doesn't bother me easy to sleep. The one last year I had it on 24/7 for about 2 months working like a champ. This one has been at the office has been running beautifully no issues. I love this model of air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, bulky and not so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Update: I decided to return the unit after discovering a rip in the duct tubing. With claims of it being easier to install than a wall-in air conditioner, I figured that this portable A/C would be a nice addition to my room during the summer months. Considering that it was a significant price difference from a standard wall-in, I was hoping that the install process was going to be seamless. In the end, it ended being more time-consuming for such a little pay off. I had high hopes and I would return if I didn't live in the city (where having a car is a luxury) and it wasn't so heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Liang

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad to have this little one to make us cool ...
customer_reviews.text: It's 89 F. here in Hawaii today! I'm so glad to have this little one to make us cool in my 385 sq feet studio. I've been using it for a month and I can tell it's so worthy to have it with reasonable price! My Zion approves it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Konabreeze

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: The box came in like it had a rough journey but the box is pretty heavy so its understandable. The unit was packed well inside its original but worn box, no scratches or dents on the product. Easy to set up. As soon as we powered the unit up it blew ice cold air out I was surprised I could not be happier.. I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rivas

customer_reviews.title: So far working very well
customer_reviews.text: I needed to cool my two car finished garage, We have a upright freezer in the garage. There are no windows, the overhead door is insulated, there is only a 9" x 12 1/2" low wall vent, The unit is working well and the hot air exit is aligned with the wall vent. Now a 114 degree hot summer, garage temp is at 100 degree closed and not opened, Using this portable A/C unit it has lowered the temp to 79 degrees. Don't know about the higher electric bill as yet, but it is saving our freezer and frozen food. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fahey

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 of these so far and I am very happy. Rather than spend thousands of dollars on new ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these so far and I am very happy. Rather than spend thousands of dollars on new central ac, I went for these units and I am glad I did. Easy to use, easy to install and they work great. Can't beat the price for the comfort it gives. I also haven't noticed any outstanding spike in my electric bill! I will most likely buy 2 more units in the near future. I have a townhouse condo and lots of square footage to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh..
customer_reviews.text: If you want your room to be cool... Buy a vent thats in fromt of the portable ac. This one has the vent ON THE TOP..to where all the cold air goes to. Also, it does NOT come with a draining hose. You have to buy one and even then...the draining hole is on the bottom of the unit so its hard to drain into a bucket. Not to memtion when i had took the cap off to see where a possible hose would go, the whole thing came completely off. Im disappointed. Now I have to drain the whole unit on towls and every 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Portable A/C very useful for small rooms/spaces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to stick in our little camper. The camper is a truck topper and not made for a roof AC, and the windows are not good for a window-type AC. This was the answer. We were able to us a space between the camper and the wheel well for the exhaust. It didn't take much to cool the camper down. We live in an old house and do not have central heating/air, so we brought this into our den and use it there when we're not camping. It cools off the den and adjacent bathroom just fine! We're happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Dafler

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great!
customer_reviews.text: For the size of this AC unit I would expect major cooling power. It moderately blows out air at 60 degrees on MAX. Control panel is clunky. The exhaust tube fittings are cheap and don't form a seal - so hot exhaust air leaks into the room your trying to cool. Not to say that it's all bad, it seems pretty durable and has kept me cool through a texas summer.
customer_reviews.author: tk

customer_reviews.title: WAY BETTER THAN A WINDOW UNIT.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a home with no central air. Bought 2 of these to cool my home, and they work like a dream! Yes they are a little loud, but no louder than a typical window unit. Set up took only minutes. These things are powerful! The vent sits right in the window seal and you do NOT have to remove the screen, and no insects will sneak in like typical window unit. The best thing about them, besides their cooling power, is the fact that when fall comes I don't have to struggle to get these out of the window. Just unplug, and roll into a closet.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley  Klingel

customer_reviews.title: Must have item - well worth purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Noise level not an issue at all and with the heat of this summer I could not do without this ! Truly cools a very large space - love it !
customer_reviews.author: Non stop shopper

customer_reviews.title: excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: ...performs very well, easy installation, the adapters provided for exhaust hose permit installation in tall (48") casement (sliding) windows; adapter parts are of heavy gauge plastic, not likely to break in handling. Controls are readily accessible on top of unit; simple to use; remote control is provided, but not really needed. on the cool setting, ...self evaporation system performs as advertised; no water accumulation in the unit; have not tried it on the dry setting where use of the drain connection is required by the manual. ... 'complaint' the only drawback is that the unit is a bit noisier that I expected; likely best for use in living areas, not bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great AC
customer_reviews.text: This is a little noisier than I expected and it feels like the remote only wants to work if you're within 2 feet of it (maybe the batteries it came with are duds?), but it cools down the room faster than any similar AC I've had and for that I give it 5 stars. Aside from being heavy and thus a little difficult to move inside the house after delivery, it was very easy to set up. Ultimately I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Loud, trips a 15A breaker, and leaks on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: Frequently fails to start the compressor and pops the 15A breaker, which has no other significant loads. Remote has to be pointed right at it to work, and it's easy to miss. It drips water into the floor, so I have it on a rubber mat. It's also very loud. It does cool my space, but not as well as a 14k btu unit should, this is likely because it's a single hose style. I wish I had returned it in time, I would not recommend it and I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner saved us. Our central air doesn't work on our second level (where our bedroom is) and we also don't have a normal window that would allow for a window AC unit. So this portable air conditioner was the cheapest solution to our issues. I would buy this again in a heartbeat. It works great at keeping our room at the desired temp. I sleep with a fan running and the fan on this machine has taken the place of that. It has been running basically non-stop for 2 months and we have had ZERO issues. Also, I'm a fan of the sleek color and simple design. It's not an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Single Outlet Only
customer_reviews.text: The single outlet hose is OK but not great. The unit must draw air from the outside to cool the condenser and that reduces efficiency. A dual hose unit which draws air in separately and expels it would have been better. I should have done more research. I will keep it as it does OK for my needs. I think the Whynter Elite ARC-122DS would have been a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: aspenflyer2388

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & Efficient
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this unit. It got the top rating from the New York Times Wirecutter reviews as well. I'm glad I bought a larger 14k BTU unit as it does well cooling the main part of my house as well as being able to move it easily to our art studio. May buy a second unit if things stay as warm as they have. Wish the window adapter was longer than 60", as I needed 80" to fit it to a sliding glass doors in both rooms. Otherwise quite happy with the unit. The "auto-swing" feature does a good job of distributing the air across taller rooms.
customer_reviews.author: aB

customer_reviews.title: A little noisy but works really well and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my office which is located over our garage. It gets really hot in that room in the summer and this was just what I needed. It cools the room which is about 250 sq/ft without issue in no time at all, even during the hottest days (100F+ outside). Installation was quick and easy. My only complaint is that it's a little noisy but I'm not terribly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Ted W.

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: I am using this AC in my room sized around about 100sf and am extremely happy with it as it is easy to install and assemble and remove. You will need no break your screen because its hose and vent system fits in the window and as long as your window screen is outside of the glass window, the air vent can lock in and close the window and cover up the upper open space with plastic panels( up and down extension mode) provided!... Very easy and convenient to install and the price was very reasonable...
customer_reviews.author: Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Tube is too short.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase often from Amazon, but this is my first product review. I only had this AC hooked up for two days. Like it so far but......the hose is too short! I've had to use a lot of duct take on both ends to make it work! When on high, it's very noisy! With a longer hose, I'd have no complaints. I haven't used the remote control yet since I live in a small studio and operating the ac manually is no problem. With a longer hose, I'd give it a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: This portable A/C is not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: This portable A/C is not bad at all. Of course it requires setup and venting, but that's obvious. It arrived on time, the box was damaged and at first look I thought it was used, but upon opening everything was undamaged and brand new. Take the time to read the instructions and install the vent properly. It was very nice to see it came with the adhesive and non-adhesive foam to seal the vented window nicely and even different sized panels to fit windows 18"-50" inches, vertical and horizontal. I would recommend this item as a good purchase and functioning air conditioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's loud and only has a high a low fan setting
customer_reviews.text: Overall it keeps the room cool, but it is really loud even in low fan mode. I feel the temp setting are off too, you have to keep it at 67 or under in order for it to really cool the room...and it is sized properly. Also surprisingly heavy for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Waters

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished, doesn't blow cold enough
customer_reviews.text: I needed to cool my studio which is 300 sq ft. The temp was over 80 degrees yesterday so as an experiment I set the unit to its lowest setting of 60. Several hours later the room temp had only changed one degree. I expect a refurbished item to be checked out prior to shipping to ensure that it operates like new. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could handle some white noise in the background; I usually run an air filter at a medium setting and have managed to fall asleep on loud trains, buses and planes but it is literally IMPOSSIBLE for me to sleep with this thing on. The only workaround for really hot nights has been to wait until I wake up sweaty, run it for a few minutes, then repeat and wake up feeling miserable. Now that I'm working from home I can't have it for hours during the day either because I can't hear anyone speak on a video chat. Also the plastic casing was cracked when it arrived. Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job,easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Like the ease of use and the portability. Only wish it had an energy control setting. The fan runs constantly. Has many good features. Well designed. Don't know why there isn't an energy saver setting.
customer_reviews.author: Deck Hand

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - LG OFFERS NO HELP OR SUPPORT FOR BROKEN PRODUCTS
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. This product went defective right before the year warranty through LG. We called LG 3 different times to try and troubleshoot the product. They confirmed that it was a manufacturer defect. However, they wouldn't issue a replacement item because the serial number on the product bought doesn't match the serial number from the receipt. Either LG shipped and labeled the wrong item, or Amazon shipped and labeled the wrong item. I don't care who did it, but this has been the worst customer experience I've ever had. All I want is a new product. Please reach out to me.
customer_reviews.author: Dhyana simmons

customer_reviews.title: Great A/C for the price
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today. Very sturdy. Glad it has wheels to move it around. Very easy set up and comes with a remote AND batteries. Has a timer to turn on and off. The only reason l gave it 4 stars is the 3 prong cord is not very long. I don't know of too many homes that have electric outlets right or near a window. My recommendation to LG is to make the cord longer and have it on a automatic rewind So you can use as little or as much length as you need. I'm really happy l got this today. It's going to be triple digits for a few days this week.
customer_reviews.author: sweets4mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for a large bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: I have no AC in my bedroom, this was a life saver on the hotter summer days. Despite what I read, it did not raise my electricity bill by much at all, which was a nice surprise. It cools down my large bedroom (and bathroom) in about 20-30 minutes when at a reasonable temperature and it auto shuts off when the desired temp is reached. Really great! Installation was a bit challenging. I found the directions a little hard to understand, and the hose was a challenge to attach, but have not had any issues since installation.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bair

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money folks
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed with this purchase. Too late to return it because I recycled the box and it’s contents. Barely cooled off my 8x12 room let alone my living room. Small room. I don’t know if I needed more btu’s Or what but we put our window air conditioner in and it cooled my whole house. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Henwood Shortle

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and it works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great deal and it works perfect. It's not silent but the noise level is as quiet as it gets for a standing or window unit. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with LG customer service and packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Just received today. The reason I am giving 1 star is because the box has obviously been opened and re-taped (see pictures). After opening box I discover some mounting screws and a bracket were missing. I called LG customer service; and after spending 35 minutes being placed on hold several times, and being told that they could only replace the bracket, I got frustrated and hung up. I will updated after unit is installed.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: This AC unit did not fail to impress me. ...
customer_reviews.text: This AC unit did not fail to impress me. I do not regret buying it! It cools my room fairly fast and I can fall asleep to the noise. Thank god I have it for the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Anna L.

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: Rolls and has a good reach with exhaust. Cold air and swing function is nice. Remote is not synced with unit and has to be pointed directly at front to function. Only 2 fan speeds. Very loud, do not understand how there can possibly be a sleep function, when pressed it does nothing. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justin b.

customer_reviews.title: cools great for a small room-
customer_reviews.text: gets very cool for my small living room but doesn't go around the corner into bedroom unfortunately....a little loud, but i like 'white noise'.....remote is nice, but there's no backlight on it, so, didn't think it'd matte, but now i find i'm always wishing i could see it in my dimly lit apartment.....would buy this model again, though for another room.
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: This should do the trick
customer_reviews.text: Cools quickly and quietly and it was easy to install. They should have made the cord a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shazam

customer_reviews.title: Check machine fully before use
customer_reviews.text: I would love to leave a good review but like so many other people I received a damaged product. First night of having it this thing leaked and soaked my carpet in a 5ft radius around the machine. Soaked it so bad you could see the water getting on top of the carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: It STINKS!
customer_reviews.text: First of all the ac STINKS! After of series of cleaning to my room the smell still stays whenever the ac is on! It makes me frustrated about it I don’t know what to do. Is anyone experienced the same thing as me? Please do tell me what you did! With the function it certainly does makes noise but the sleep mode is durable. I used it with my tower fan on so it does makes my room cold.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the family room cold in this heat
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my downstairs very cool and comfortable, insulating the exhaust to keep the room from heating up is a must though.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: No where to contact  to ask  for help ,bad !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I receive my LG 10200 portable air conditioner on Friday there where no instructions pamphlet in the box I try to contact LG ,there is no where to contact them they have chat a line where they direct you to a site to pay $5.00 !!! Bad customer service very bad . I hope the air conditioner is better I will see when I install it, wish me luck .
customer_reviews.author: Klaus A.

customer_reviews.title: Used item arrived obviously damaged
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a used item. It arrived in a pile of parts and torn packaging. I refused delivery Refund was prompt, so not unhappy. I later purchased unit new elsewhere and it works great
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: horribly packaged and damaged!
customer_reviews.text: the box came completely damaged. the little piece in the back is broken and leaking water, no remote no screws... what the heck?
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I needed an air conditioner for our bedroom because we can't sleep when it's hot. This was a perfect answer. It works great and hasn't affected our electric bill at all. I think it cut down on what our home air conditioner has to do at night, so it evens out. Our kwh usage last year was 2 more than this year with the same average outdoor temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Freak

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install/cools immediately/ not very loud at all
customer_reviews.text: August 30, 2018: I unpacked and completely installed this unit in less than 10 minutes. The unit is heavy but so relatively quiet and cooled my study quite quickly. Exhaust system was easy to set up. I have had very good experiences with LG for many years now. Hoping this will be another one. Extended warranty ($65) gives two additional years after first year. Complete coverage, no additional financial outlay if unit becomes inoperable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Janney

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but arrived with a crack on the front.
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This unit has been a godsend! My home is brick, bedroom is on the third level, floor vents for central AC and flat roof. At night it seems that the bricks release heat which makes for temperature in the 80s through the night on that level. Everyone is right about the noise, but we got used to it and sleep well now.
customer_reviews.author: MultisportSW

customer_reviews.title: Cool and quiet, especially on a lower fan speed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased unit after reading Wirecutter review. Very pleased with this purchase. Setup was simple enough and easily connected to home WiFi. Per the review, the unit runs quiet and cool. The mobile app is ok but lags a little bit. Otherwise a top notch product -- highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Magis Book Reviews

customer_reviews.title: The description says it will cool a 500 sq ft room
customer_reviews.text: The description says it will cool a 500 sq ft room. I suppose it will as long as the outside temp isn’t over 85. At that temp, the room is tolerable. I have it in a 400 sq ft second story room and in 90 deg weather it has a hard time cooling it at all
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Raftary

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Price!
customer_reviews.text: This portable air conditioner is just what we needed to keep us comfortable. We already have one portable AC unit because our central AC needs to be replaced but we can’t afford that right now. We bought this second unit because our kitchen and living room are separated only by a breakfast bar and it gets too warm when I cook. We set up this unit easily within minutes and our home is cool while the oven and stove are on during the warmest part of the day. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Sew

customer_reviews.title: Sudden Loud Noise after light use
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed after only a few days of light use the unit started making some kind of rotational scraping noise like a fan scraping against it's housing when powered on, no errors were displayed, noise is clearly not normal compression and is jarring, not able to sleep and will wake you up in the middle of the night. Going to need to return this unit I fear...ugh.
customer_reviews.author: John Warner

customer_reviews.title: Effective and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Effective for cooling my bedroom which came with an air conditioner in the window, but that one was old and not very effective. Pros: Rather quiet, especially when it isn't actively cooling. Effective at cooling the space it says it can. Cons: Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: stabier

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. I got a larger size unit because this one is quieter, and I’m glad I did. I am not sure the smaller one would’ve actually worked anywhere near as well.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar pickin' gal

customer_reviews.title: The glue on the foam that seals the vent in the window is super sticky and the directions have you attach it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Too noisy for a bedroom unless you live near an airport. The glue on the foam that seals the vent in the window is super sticky and the directions have you attach it to the window not the vent, so when you take out the vent window can't close. And when you remove the foam you need to use nail polish remover. I returned the AC unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: We got this unit for an add-on room at our building that houses our tv decoders and other heat - emitting units. The room has no insulation, so freezing in winter, sweltering in summer. This unit was purchased to try and keep the room from getting so hot that our equipment would fry. So far, it's been up to the task. It hasn't exactly chilled the small room it is in, but by the same token it has kept the room noticeably cooler during the extended heat wave we've had this summer. Reasonably quiet as well. So far I would have to say it's done it's job as well as we could have hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: artie fax

customer_reviews.title: Saved my summer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I had no A.C. during a terrible heatwave. Incredibly easy to set up, easy to work. My only warning would be to make sure to know the voltage in your power outlets, this has blown the electricity out my house multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: I should have gone with a higher BTU rating!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small apartment and I thought I purchased enough BTU to cool it. It did NOT meet the challenge. And as mentioned in other reviews... it’s LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, but installation is ridiculous
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and seems to work well, but when are these ac companies going to learn to make products that are simple to install? You lock the exhaust in place then screw it to the window thingie but if it's locked in place only one screw goes in and if it isn't locked in place everything is too unstable to screw in. I mean just lots of swearing at 8 in the morning when it doesn't need to be this way, LG!
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel-tev

customer_reviews.title: Works but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: The condenser noise is pretty loud, if I listen to something on headphone in the room with AC on, I need to double the volume. Also can't sleep with it on. But one of the more fundamental issues with portable air conditioner is it uses air in door to push heat outside, which creates negative air pressure in the room. With negative air pressure, the hot air outside the room rushes in through doors etc., which greatly reduces cooling efficiency. Haven't used window AC, but would assume it worker better in this case. Besides it takes up a lot of space in the room. So would not recommend if you have other options.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It does its job of cooling down a small studio apartment. Fortunately mine was delivered by UPS and the packaging was intact. No broken pieces or boxes upon delivery. Overall, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Haha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for a bedroom size. Gets the room plenty cool and a small compact size. Wish the hose was in the side so the unit could go flat up against a wall, but unfortunately not a single unit I saw had this feature... just some pointers for LGs next design.
customer_reviews.author: Nikol

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Broken (Packed Broken: Box Exterior Umdamaged)
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. I only suggest buying this if you want a broken item for over $400. This AC was JUST delivered to our house. The exterior of the box is fine (no dents), so is the packing material it came in. This AC had to have been packed broken. The whole front piece is sticking out because the clip that holds it on is broken. Sure, it still blows cold air (for now), but an item this much still shouldnt be delivered damaged. Save yourself the money and frustration of spending so much on an item to have it be delivered broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drain port broken
customer_reviews.text: I received this item with ok shipping box, but after I opened it I found that the drain port was broken. Although the broken drain port does not affect the functionality as an air conditioner (the manual said the drain port is not needed if only the Cool mode is used), the broken part still makes me feel pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: ly2314

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box does not work, awful sign, and a huge pain having to deal with this now. I just paid a lot of money and only received a massive hassle and waste of my time.
customer_reviews.author: david rosen

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my LG AC!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t arrive soon enough up here in sweltering Alaska! Arrived in only 5 days! Installed like a charm in 30 min. using all 4 window panels. Only downside was the window panel kit didn’t come with enough screws to attach the panels but I managed to scrounge some up. Nice to be chillaxin’ this July 4th weekend! Update: Good thing I got it the day before the 4th! We hit the all time record high of 90 on July 4th, and more heat is on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Meliton

customer_reviews.title: Only rated for 200 square feet and we cool off about 800 square feet to the point to ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for Hurricane Irma, just made it right before the storm came, ran it on our generator and it cooled off the main section of our house enough to make it bearable, 5 stars all of the way. Only rated for 200 square feet and we cool off about 800 square feet to the point to make it comfortable. Excellent unit very happy with it and it was a life saver while we didn't have Electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The air conditioner works pretty great for cooling my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The air conditioner works pretty great for cooling my bedroom. You must have your window closed for it to work and cool down the room. The unit is quite heavy too, so you might need help getting it upstairs like I did. The unit does have small wheels to move it around which is helpful. Also, the air tube is super loud so it makes it difficult to sleep. I've had to use ear plugs to help me sleep. I'm a light sleeper. Overall, thus far, I've had the unit for a year and I'm happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: 4 Olga

customer_reviews.title: blessed relief from summer heat
customer_reviews.text: waited until halfway thru a hot summer to get this. wish i'd done it day one. terrific AC unit, though i'm not going to lie to you it is NOT quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ben brown

customer_reviews.title: Broken Promises
customer_reviews.text: I bought this AC because the weather has been in the 90s lately and I couldn't take it anymore. I was able to get a good window seal worked out, without too much trouble. The packaging says it should be able to cool down a room of 200sq ft. I figured it would be great in my 100 sq ft office. It definitely makes a difference. However, I'd say all it does is take the edge off. For the price, It is not much better than the $40 box fan I purchased at Target. I set it to the lowest possible setting, and it is still quite the disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Works great! It’s loud though
customer_reviews.text: Cooled off my bedroom. It is a loud unit though
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Segalini

customer_reviews.title: IT CANNOT BE RETURNED!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot have the ac working. It always causes the breaker tripping, no matter which room. PLEASE NOTE IT CANNOT BE RETURNED BEFORE YOU BUY! I also contacted the LG customer service. They did not reply to my request. Though in the call they said they normally respond in three days, the fact was they ignored my request for more than two weeks. When I called them, they said they did not provide repair service to this unit. Then the one-year warranty is ridiculous. Never had such a bad experience before. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Hongjie Q.

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend you look for something different
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace a 6 year old similar AC unit and it's ONLY been running for 11 DAYS and the fan cage/squirrel cage broke this morning. Each day the sound of the AC unit has been getting tremendously louder and louder. I have a service ticket in with LG to either replace/fix the unit or return it. For the money, it's NOT worth the headache....look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: PMMK

customer_reviews.title: Germs super cold in big rooms.
customer_reviews.text: Cools our room completely. Easy to install. Keep up on maintenance of cleaning air filter and you will be fine. Our room is half of an oversized two car garage. Love it at 69 with its 100 outside!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Only thing missing is HomeKit and Siri support.
customer_reviews.text: This air conditioner has been working great for me. It’s the best portable unit on the market that I could find. I like that I can control it remotely with my phone, but it’s an inconvenience to use the LG app if I just want to adjust the temperature. Maybe the next version will work with HomeKit and Siri. Then it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great AC but had to return for new one
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great but the one I ordered had a broken piece when it came so I had to return it and buy another one. But Amazon was great with the return, and overall this is an incredible unit. Cool, calm, quiet. Like eating a popsicle in the library.
customer_reviews.author: ButterWillDoIt

customer_reviews.title: LG is not helpful
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing an important part, and it has been impossible to deal with LG customer service. We have had the air conditioner for almost 3 weeks and can’t use it. It’s going back. FYI I was given a code to enter when I sent proof of purchase and none of them worked. After sitting on the phone for over 30 minutes multiple times with nothing resolved I’m moving on. The amazon staff were helpful, but also unable to get LG to resolve. Also I tried to buy the duct piece separately on amazon and it is $70.
customer_reviews.author: BELINDA

customer_reviews.title: LOUD
customer_reviews.text: The unit definitely works very well to cool a bedroom. You buy an AC for a bedroom so you can sleep, the problem is, this unit is VERY loud and there's no way I will be able to sleep with it on. It is MUCH louder than a fan on high. Even though we're in a heat wave, I'm returning this b/c unit. I will also note that this is the second unit I received b/c the first unit arrived totally beat up - box and all. I'm pretty sure it was a used return from another customer and they sent it to me as new.
customer_reviews.author: KAC

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Does an excellent job. Cooled two bedrooms without a hitch. Not to noisy, more like white noise. The foam sealer material sticks to everything so you have to be careful installing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wick

customer_reviews.title: I love this air conditioner it works really well and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this air conditioner it works really well and it was relatively easy to set up. These past few weeks we have had temperatures into the 100's and it has kept my room at a nice 65-70 degrees. It works great for just one medium sized room, but absolutely would not have the power to cool down a whole home. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Very weak  air conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very weak. It can not cool down the 370 sq. ft room to the programmed temperature. Besides, this air conditioner was refurbished and it was not mentioned in the head line but hidden somewhere in the description. We would not buy it for this price if we new it was refurbished. Do not recommend this item to anybody. Unfortunately it was too late to return the unit when the weather became hot enough to test the purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Yuri Belopolsky

customer_reviews.title: works but is LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Cools good enough but not super well. It's also VERY loud. Ideally i'd like to leave it on while we sleep but that's not really possible.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1

customer_reviews.title: So loud
customer_reviews.text: Within a year of getting this AC it went from kind of loud to extremely loud. It sounds like a jackhammer when it is turned on. We have followed all the instructions to keep everything clean, and we even watched some videos from the LG website on how to take it apart to clean the inside to avoid the loud noises and nothing helps. I only turn it on when I absolutely have to because it is so disruptive. Waste of money. I wish I just bought a cheap window unit.
customer_reviews.author: MBrenna

customer_reviews.title: Good AC, only use in small rooms
customer_reviews.text: I originally used this for my own bedroom and it worked really well for that size room. Don't expect it to do a large area though. It really works for what area it is rated for.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Lindblom

customer_reviews.title: helped during emergency
customer_reviews.text: got for my tenant, as an emergency to actual AC stopped working. Got two units, ended up using straight 2month everyday. I would say it's right bang for money..
customer_reviews.author: Jimit

product_meta.title: LG LP1217GSR 12,000 BTU Graphite Gray Portable Air Conditioner - Rooms up to 400 Sq. Ft
product_meta.description:
Size:Rooms up to 400 Sq. Ft.| Style:Cool OnlyRoom to room, house to house or home to work, LG’s portable air conditioner is the ideal climate-control solution for when you’re on the go. With a sleek contemporary design, this free-standing portable unit blends in with any room decor. Our auto-swing air vent technology makes sure you enjoy every bit of cool air by circulating the cool air more efficiently so no hot spot will be left untouched. The auto evaporation system allows for continuous use and with the programmable 24-hour on/off timer, you can control the temperature even when you’re not there.

In October 2017, the Department of Energy implemented a new test procedure to determine the BTU rating of portable air conditioners. The procedural change has adjusted the amount of BTUs allowed to be claimed downward by as much as 50%. There have been no internal changes to these units, and the functionality remains the same. Please refer to room size guidelines to find the portable air conditioner that best meets your needs.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One LG LP1217GSR 12,000 BTU Portable Air Conditioner for Rooms up to 400 Sq. Ft - in Graphite Gray color. One LCD Remote Control and One Windows installation kit
Air conditioner dimensions: 16.93” W x 27.36” H x 12.80” D. | Weight 67.2 lbs
Performance: 12,000 BTU. Dehumidification: 5.5 pts/hr. | Est. cooling area of 400-sq.ft. | Noise Front dB (A) (High/Low) 53/51
Other specifications: Dry Air Flow (CFM) 220 | Voltage / 60 Hz 115 V | CEC Cooling Power (W): 1350

Bucket less design with auto-evaporation system built into this model. Moisture created by the cooling process evaporates inside the unit, allowing continuous operation without having to regularly empty the bucket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,559 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Portable air conditioner, remote control, mesh filters, installation kit, manual, warranty
